# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Accesses a pose transformation using the index of the joint name.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(joint: String) -> Transform? { get set }
```

## Parameters

- **joint**: The joint name of transformation to access.

## Overview
